    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic1290</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Rumeni žafran</string>
            <string language="en">Yellow crocus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelber Krokus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crocus jaune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Açafrão amarelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Croco giallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίτρινος κρόκος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Azafrán amarilla</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">v šolskem skalnjaku išče prve spomladanske sončne žarke rumeni žafran.</string>
            <string language="en">School rock garden is perfect place for yellow crocus to catch first spring sunshine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žafran</string>
            <string language="en">crocus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">cvet</string>
            <string language="en">bloom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">roža</string>
            <string language="en">flower</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">skalnjak</string>
            <string language="en">rock garden</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schulefelsengarten ist vollkommener Platz, damit 
gelber Krokus ersten Frühling Sonnenschein abfängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jardin de roche d'école est endroit parfait 
pour que le crocus jaune attrape le premier soleil de ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jardim da rocha da escola é lugar perfeito 
para que o açafrão amarelo trave a primeira luz do sol da mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il giardino della roccia della scuola è posto 
perfetto affinchè il croco giallo interferisca il primo sole della 
molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κήπος σχολικού βράχου είναι τέλεια θέση για τον 
κίτρινο κρόκο για να πιάσει την πρώτη ηλιοφάνεια άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El jardín de la roca de la escuela es lugar 
perfecto para que el azafrán amarilla coja la primera sol del 
resorte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krokus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blüte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
